entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
